hero.headline: OpenAI Launches GPT-5.2 in 'Code Red' Response to Google Competition
hero.summary: OpenAI released GPT-5.2 on December 11, their most capable model series yet, featuring 400K token context, August 2025 knowledge cutoff, and three variants (Instant, Thinking, Pro). The launch comes just one month after GPT-5.1, following CEO Sam Altman's internal 'code red' memo about losing market share to Google.
hero.whyItMatters: This aggressive release cadence signals intensifying competition in the AI space. GPT-5.2's improved coding, spreadsheet creation, and long-context capabilities make it a direct competitor to Claude Opus 4.5 for professional knowledge work. The 1.4x price increase also hints at sustainable AI business models emerging.

topStories.title: Critical React Server Components Vulnerability Disclosed
topStories.summary: React team disclosed denial-of-service and source code exposure vulnerabilities in React Server Components. The security advisory highlights growing risks as more production apps adopt server-first React architectures.

topStories.title: Next-AI-Draw-IO: Create Diagrams with Natural Language
topStories.summary: A new Next.js app integrating AI with draw.io shot to 1,038 stars today. It lets developers create, modify, and enhance diagrams through natural language commands - a practical AI assistant for technical documentation and architecture planning.

topStories.title: OpenAI Used Codex to Ship Sora for Android in 28 Days
topStories.summary: OpenAI published a case study revealing how they used their own Codex tool to rapidly build and ship Sora's Android app in under a month. This 'dogfooding' demonstrates the productivity gains AI coding assistants can deliver at scale.

topStories.title: Microsoft Research Introduces 'Promptions' UI Framework
topStories.summary: Microsoft Research unveiled Promptions (prompt + options), a new UI framework that helps developers build AI interfaces with dynamic controls. Users report it reduces the effort of prompt engineering by enabling precise control without repeated rephrasing.

notableHooks.name: Auto-Format TypeScript
notableHooks.description: Automatically runs prettier on TypeScript files after any Edit or Write operation, ensuring consistent code formatting without manual intervention.

notableHooks.name: Input Modification Hooks
notableHooks.description: New in v2.0.10: PreToolUse hooks can now modify tool inputs before execution - enabling transparent sandboxing, automatic dry-run flags, and secret redaction.

notableHooks.name: Desktop Notifications
notableHooks.description: Send desktop notifications when Claude Code completes a session. Perfect for long-running tasks where you want to be alerted when work is done.

tuiTools.name: lazygit
tuiTools.description: Simple terminal UI for git commands. The most popular TUI for version control with keyboard-driven workflows.

tuiTools.name: posting
tuiTools.description: Powerful HTTP client that lives in your terminal. Built with Textual (Python), perfect for API development without leaving the CLI.

tuiTools.name: gitui
tuiTools.description: Blazing fast terminal UI for git written in Rust with Ratatui. High performance alternative to lazygit.

tuiTools.name: k9s

AI News: GPT-5.2, Devstral 2, Boom Superpower, MCP Nonprofit and more!

highlights: Prompt suggestions with Tab to accept - speeds up common workflows
Thinking mode enabled by default for Opus 4.5
Search functionality added to /permissions command with / keyboard shortcut
Gemini 3 support rolled out to all API key and Pro/Ultra users
Intelligent model routing - Flash for simple queries, Pro for complex tasks
New extensions for AlloyDB, BigQuery, Cloud SQL, Dataplex, Firestore, Looker
GPT-5.2 model now available with 400K context and Aug 2025 knowledge
Codex for Linear integration - assign @Codex in issues to start cloud tasks
Skills system injects SKILL.md content into conversations

notableQuotes.quote: Context engineering is replacing prompt engineering as the new frontier of control. It's not about clever wording anymore. It's about designing environments where AI can think with depth, consistency, and purpose.
notableQuotes.author: Industry Analysis

notableQuotes.quote: GPT-5.2 is the most capable model series yet for professional knowledge work - better at creating spreadsheets, building presentations, perceiving images, writing code and understanding long context.
notableQuotes.author: OpenAI

notableQuotes.quote: Starting in v2.0.10, PreToolUse hooks can modify tool inputs before execution. Instead of blocking Claude's actions, hooks intercept tool calls and let execution proceed with corrected parameters.
notableQuotes.author: Claude Code Team

prompt: Daily AI news digest for GGPrompts. Gathered data from aggregated feed, web searches for Claude Code/Gemini CLI/Codex/prompt engineering news, GitHub trending repos via trotd, SkillsMP feed, Docker MCP catalog, YouTube trending API, and hook documentation. Curated for prompt engineering audience with focus on agentic AI tools, MCP servers, and developer productivity.
